body:
1. Correct the installation step for mummer.  It has it's own handcrafted build process which is intended to build and run from the same location.  I was copying the various bits to `prefix`, but I missed a variety of hardcoded references that the build step seds into the perl scripts.

2. Speaking of perl scripts, add a dependency on our perl.
title: Correct installation step for mummer (and dependency)
